p: People have to choose to live like the ancient Indians lived, with cultural distancing and behaviour, while also working to build the economy through new frontiers in engineering, technology, medicine and agriculture, with continuous research on virology. The country must be ready to face any kind of situation and medical emergency. The production of indigenously developed ventilators, homemade masks, etc., along with governmental efforts to increase the capacity of hospitals and doctors, should be given priority. The COVID-19 pandemic can be been viewed as a crisis opportunity for the development of India.
